body.section:
Information
Chat feature was implemented and integrated since Ivy 6.1.
On 6.0(since 6.0.3), It's intentionally switched off for some reasons.
Some customers have their own Chat, they do not need another.
For using Chat, user has to self configure it on their server(needs additional Libs).
Current implementation of Chat contains several problems, might lead to bad user experience.
For users who want to use Chat on Ivy 6.0
First, IvyEngine needs to be configured to use Chat. Copy below two libs into WEB-INF/lib folder located on AxonIvyEngine, AxonIvyDesigner
portal-chat-endpoints.jar
atmosphere-runtime-2.4.2.jar
Second, Enables Chat on UI by setting enablesChat param <ui:param name="enablesChat" value="true" /> Added this line to your pages that are using BasicTemplates of Portal(adds to DefaultPortalHomeTemplate.xhtml, TaskTempate.xhtml, etc.)
e.g: <ui:composition template="/layouts/BasicTemplate.xhtml"> <ui:param name="enablesChat" value="true" /> ... </ui:composition>
Third, extract this jar file portal-chat-endpoints-sources.jar, we will some java files and have to copy them to Portal Kit project as below
Copy ChatBean.java file in ch\ivy\addon\portalkit\bean to PortalKit\src\ch\ivy\addon\portalkit\bean folder
Copy folder ch\ivy\addon\portalkit\chat to PortalKit\src\ch\ivy\addon\portalkit folder
Restarts Ivy Desinger/Ivy Engine, refresh Portal Kit project in designer since we have some new files, rebuild and re-deploy it to Engine. Then enjoy Chat
